text: Hand is an unincorporated community in Horry County, South Carolina, United States. Hand is located along SC 90 between Conway and Wampee. ==History== A post office called Hand was established in 1888, and remained in operation until 1942. The origin of the name "Hand" is obscure. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Horry County, South Carolina Category:Unincorporated communities in South Carolina
title: Hand, South Carolina
